description: A cozy statement piece that embodies Cotopaxi's commitments to sustainability and style, the Abrazo Half-Zip Fleece Jacket puts a Cotopaxi spin on the classic fleece pullover with fresh color patterns and recycled fabric. In addition to its half-zip design that allows for quick temperature control and easy on/off, this soft and stylish fleece features front hand pockets and a stretchy, zippered chest pocket to stash your small must-haves.
name: Cotopaxi Abrazo Half-Zip Fleece Jacket - Mens
